attributes.action: Scrap the new stadium in the Historic Stanley Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If they go ahead building the new stadium, it will affect the school  and the cemetery, houses opposite the new stadium. As I am a dog walker, where would I take my dog when the stadium built. It is the people living in Liverpool dont want the new stadium and the original stadium is enough for people and Liverpool fans
